items.sentence: Does anyone have any idea what this is all about?
Tom and Mary introduced themselves to each other.
Tom and Mary looked like they were going to kiss.
Tom and Mary sang the song they had just written.
Tom and Mary are the best friends I\'ve ever had.
It was raining in Boston on the day Tom was shot.
This might take a lot more time than we expected.
It\'s up to us to make sure Tom doesn\'t do that.
Tom and Mary haven\'t been happy for a long time.
I think that would only take about three minutes.
Tell Tom I\'ll be ready by the time he gets here.
You\'re expected to do that as well, aren\'t you?
Tom knew right away that something wasn\'t right.
Tom is not very likely to be at tonight\'s party.
Tom doesn\'t play the cello as well as Mary does.
Tom hasn\'t practiced the piano at all this week.
I still don\'t know who I\'m supposed to talk to.
I still don\'t quite understand what\'s going on.
Tom noticed Mary the moment she entered the room.
Tom is having problems with one of his neighbors.
